neverForgetAReturnVisit_description: Umurimo w'Umuhamya izajya ikwibutsa abo ugomba gusubira gusura no kwigisha Bibiliya. Wahindura ibi nyuma mu igenamiterere.
youreAllSet_description: Umurimo w'Umuhamya izajya ikwibutsa abo ugomba kuganira na bo.
optInNotificationsLater: Ushobora kwemerera Notification nyuma mu igenamiterere.
noContactsSaved: Nta aderesi zirimo. Kanda akemenyetso ko guteranya wongeremo aderesi.
deleteConversation_description: Gusiba iki kiganiro, birakivanaho burundu ndetse n'imenyekanisha ry'ikiganiro (Notification).
goalBasedOnPublisherType: Intego zishingiye ku mubwiriza uri we
addTime_description: Gushyiramo amakuru y'igihe birashyiraho amasaha kuri uwo munsi
tapPlusToAddConvo: Kanda akamenyetso ko guteranya ushyiremo ikiganiro.
name: Izina
enterContactInformation: Shyiramo amakuru y'umuntu ugiye kongera muri Umurimo w'Umuhamya.
reminderFifteenMinutes_part2: kiri mu minota 15. Itegure, muze kugirana ikiganiro cyiza!üöÄüìñ
addConversation_description: Shyiramo amakuru y'ikiganiro hasi aha ku kiganiro muzagirana.
note_placeholder: Andika hasi uko ikiganiro cyagenze. Usobanure neza!
topic_placeholder: Shyiramo ingingo; Urugero: Ishimire Isomo rya 1
notifyMe_notice: Uzamenyeshwa umunsi 1 mbere na iminota 15 mbere y'igihe wagennye.
recoverContacts_description: Kanda gusubiramo hasi kugira ngo ugarure aderesi. Gusiba aderesi hano birayisiba burundu ndetse n'ibiganiro mwagiranye.
permanentlyDeleteContact_warning: Gusiba aderesi hano birayisiba burundu ndetse n'ibiganiro mwagiranye.
basedOnContacts: Bishingiye ku bo uganira na bo
deleteTime_description: Gusiba iyi raporo y'amasaha birayivanamo burundu.
notificationsDisabled: Biragusaba gushyiramo notification kuri Umurimo w'Umuhamya
notificationsDisabled_description: Urashaka ko tukujyana mu igenamiterere ya telephone?
inactiveBibleStudiesDoNoCountTowardsMont: Ibyigisho bya Bibiliya ntibijya kuri raporo y'ukwezi niba bitarayoborewe nibura rimwe mu kwezi.
loadingSlowly_description: Wongere mukanya ufite WiFi cyangwa Internet imeze neza.
timeNeeded: Kugira ngo wemeze, shyiramo amasaha n'iminota.
archiveContact_description: Kubika aderesi birayisiba. Ushobora kuyigarura unyuze mu igenamiterere.
tapToAddAConversation: Kanda hano cyangwa akamenyetso ko guteranya ushyiremo ikiganiro.
androidAppStoreReviewErrorMessage: Genzura niba gushyiramo porogaramu na Play Store byemewe.
appleAppStoreReviewErrorMessage: Turakwiginze, huza n'igihe porogaramu ya Umurimo w'Umuhamya niba bikunda. Wongere mukanya.
internetNotAvailable: Nta interineti ufite. Wongere igihe uraba ufite interineti.
addNotAtHome_description: Shiramo amakuru yose ya ngombwa yo kuba utabonanye nawe.
add_description: Shyira 'Ntago ari mu rugo' cyangwa 'Ikiganiro' ku byahise by'umuntu.
hoursPerDayToGoal: amasaha ku munsi kugera ku ntego!
iWouldLikeToHelpTranslate: Wifuza gufasha mu buhinduzi bwa Umurimo w'Umuhamya? Garagaza ururimi uvuga neza n'izina ryawe. Urakoze!
helpTranslate_message: Umurimo w'Umuhamya uboneka mu ndimi zirenga 10+ hakoreshejwe ubuhinduzi bwikora. Hari igihe usanga ubu buhinduzi budahuje n'ukuri. Ese wifuza gufasha mu gukora ubuhinduzi bw'ukuri?
couldNotFetchCoordinatesFromAddress: Coordinates ntiziboneka kuri aderesi. Niba ushaka kureba aderesi ye ku ikarita, uragerageza mukanya.
generateAUrlFromYourPreferredMappingServ: Sangiza link mu kuva kuri serivise z'amakarita zitandukanye.
mapViewOnboarding3: Ushobora kwemeza gukoresha serivise za location kugira ngo urebe aho uherereye ku ikarita.
weDidOurBestToUpdateAllOfYourContacts: Hafi ya aderesi zose zahujwe n'igihe ariko zishobora kuba zitahujwe n'igihe. Ongera mukanya.
coordinatesAllowMapView: Coordinates zikwemerera kureba aderesi ku ikarita.
thisMayHelpYouLocateWhereYouAre: Urashobora kubona aho uri. Ikarita nabwo yakora uramutse utatwemereye kumenya aho uri.
yourLocationIsNeverSharedToExternalServi: Aho uherereye ntabwo bisangizwa izindi application na serivise.
locationSharingDisabled: Biragusaba kwemerera Locations kuri Umurimo w'Umuhamya
pinsAreBasedOnYourMostRecentConversation: Biba bishingiye ku gihe muheruka kuganira. 'Abatari murugo' bafatwa nko gusubira gusura.
thisWillBeConfigurableLater: Mu guhuza n'igihe biri imbere, ibi bihe byagenwe bishobora guhindurwa.
pleaseDescribeYourFeatureClearly: Turagusaba gusobanura imiterere ushaka mu buryo bunonosoye. Garagaza izina na nimero. Niba bikunda, shushanya uko iyo miterere yaba imeze. Cyangwa, uhoreza screenshot ya application ifite imiterere bimeze kimwe.
couldNotOpenMaps_description: Turagusaba kwemeza ikarita ifite application irimo.
preferredMaps_description: Umurimo w'Umuhamya uzajya ukoresha ikarita wemeje.

1211.c1: Hongewe izindi ngingo z'ingenzi inshuro imwe aho bikenewe.

1210.c4: Hanonosowe ubuziranenge kuri ekara y'ikarita harimo n'amakuru akenewe ndetse na buto yo kongeramo byihuse.

1201.c1: Huza n'igihe igice cya buri kwezi ahabanza kugira ngo ubone amezi abanza n'akurikira.
1201.c2: Hanonosowe ubuhinduzi bwo mu rurimi rwa Korean - Muvandimwe Paul, wakoze. Niba ushaka gufasha guhindura mu rurimi rwawe, reba mu igenamiterere.

1200.c1: Hongewemo ubryo bwo kugarura no kubika amakuru bwite ya application. Ushobora kubika kuri Cloud, ukabigarura nyuma no mu bindi bikoresho bya elegitoroniki. Wabyohereza no ku zindi platform. Reba iyi miterere mishya mu igenamiterere.

1120.c1: Hongewemo ubryo bwo kugarura no kubika amakuru bwite ya application. Ushobora kubika kuri Cloud, ukabigarura nyuma no mu bindi bikoresho bya elegitoroniki. Wabyohereza no ku zindi platform. Reba iyi miterere mishya mu igenamiterere.

1111.c1: Hongewemo i paji yo gutanga impano kubifuza gutanga impano. Reba mu igenamiterere.

1110.c1: Hongewemo gukoreshwa na iPad na Tablet neza!
1110.c2: Hahinduwe imiterere imwe n'imwe kugira ngo ikore neza muri ekara nini.
1110.c3: Adjusted the method of submitting Bug Reports and Feature Requests to Github.

1100.c1: Adds annual report to Time Reports screen! Keep track of your service year progress at a glance.
1100.c2: Adding time from Time Reports screen now defaults the report to the selected month.
1100.c3: Fixes an issue exporting January service report.

192.c1: Now tap on a conversation row to edit, or swipe left as before.
192.c2: Fixes an issue where some devices have an overflowing progress bar.
192.c3: Adds more verbose handling of link errors for certain devices lacking required applications.
192.c4: Navigate directly to a month from the monthly routine section of the home screen.
192.c5: Time Reports screen better handles empty and future months.

191.c1: Resolves an issue navigating to time screens.

190.c2: [iOS] Select between Google, Apple, and Waze as your default navigation app in preferences.
190.c3: Ubu wagena igihe gisanzwe cyo gukurikirana n'imenyekanisha mu igenamiterere.
190.c5: New progress bar organizes your time entries by category
190.c6: Now add custom tags to your time entries
190.c7: Updated Time Reports screen to be better organized and separated by month

182.c1: Updated all time to reflect the current locale

181.c2: Added store review request after certain criteria is met

162.c1: Adjusted special pioneer hour requirement from 70 to 100

161.c1: Added more minute options for time entries

160.c1: Conversations are now editable. Notifications are configurable
160.c2: Swipe gestures to edit or delete conversations, contacts, etc.
160.c3: Added haptic feedback to various important actions

1220.c3: Added Calendar to time reports screen.
1220.c1: Preferences are now better organized by category.
1220.c2: Improved import & export screen to be visually clearer.
1220.c4: Occasionally notifies you to create a new backup. This is configurable in the settings.

1221.c1: [iOS] Date and Time pickers now use the correct locale
1221.c2: Fixed an issue where editing a conversation would incorrectly navigate.
1221.c3: Other minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
1221.c4: Improved Spanish translation - thank you brother Cleen. If you'd like to help translate your own language, see 'Help Translate' in the settings.

1230.c1: Added new Annual Overview screen to view your service year progress by month.
1230.c2: Added 'Today' button to quickly navigate back to current month when viewing previous months or years.
1230.c3: Updated Special Pioneers to not have an annual goal by default.
1230.c4: Added 'Annual Goal' setting to publisher preferences. This allows you to override the default setting for your publisher type.
1230.c5: Greatly improved Italian translations, thank you brother Giuseppe!

1240.c1: Added ability to manually adjust contact pin location on all map views. Simply touch, hold, and drag the pin.
1240.c2: Added small map view to contact details screen and resolved errors for invalid coordinates.
1240.c3: Resolved an overflow visual issue that sometimes occurs on small screens when viewing map contact cards.

1250.c1: Big update! Added scheduling & plans! üöÄ You can now create one-time plans, recurring plans, and view your month's schedule.
1250.c2: Improved clarity by adding 'toast' notifications for notable app actions.
1250.c3: Updated various sections of time reports screen to have more information and easier navigation.
1250.c4: Resolved minor visual issues and other bugs.
1250.c5: Added font size offset setting to preferences. This allows you to adjust the font size of the app.

1260.c1: Fixed issue where scroll position would be lost on TimeReportsScreen. Resolved other issues related to time reports screen.
1260.c2: LDC hours do not contribute more towards annual goal past 55 hours for any given month.
1260.c3: Recurring plans can be deleted by single event or single event and all future events.
1260.c4: New custom fields for contacts! You can create any number of custom fields you wish.
1260.c5: You can now share your time directly with NW Publisher!

1270.c1: Added Timer! ‚è±Ô∏è (Stopwatch). You can now start and stop a timer to track your time directly within the app.
1270.c2: Resolved crashing issue for some devices when navigating to the Contact Details screen.
1270.c4: Other minor bug fixes and improvements.

1280.c3: Update dependencies and add security updates.
1280.c2: Updated Portuguese translations, thank you brother S√©rgio!
1280.c4: üìù A little personal note: I have been very busy with congregation responsibilities and life recently. After my upcoming convention next week, things will return more back to normal. I will be working on many more updates in the coming weeks! Thank you for your patience and for choosing WitnessWork! ‚ù§Ô∏è

1290.c1: Added new schedule section to month summary screen which helps you keep track of your time pacing.
1290.c2: On home screen, resolved overlapping issues that sometimes happen on small screen sizes.
1290.c3: You can now edit time entries! Tap on them!
1290.c4: Many improvements have been made to clarity of how to add, update, and delete various items across WitnessWork. Hints have been removed as they're no longer necessary.
1290.c5: I'm looking for 2 volunteers who have experience in Software QA to assist in testing releases before they reach the public. If you have interest in spending a few hours a month testing, your support would be greatly appreciated. Please contact me: levi@leviwilkerson.com. In the future and as expenses allows, a portion of donations will go to QA for their time.
1290.c6: Annual time overview screen now is compressed for better readability.

1291.c1: [ANDROID] Resolved crashes that occurred when editing time.

1300.c1: Add 'Annual Schedule' to Plan Schedule screen for those with an annual goal, allowing you to easily see if you have planned enough time for your entire service year.
1300.c2: Hides 'today' schedule view when the month is in the future because it's not applicable.
1300.c4: If a contact pin was dragged for a contact, navigation will now prioritize the manually adjusted pin over their address. Editing a contact's address will return the address to priority.
1300.c7: Contact pin colors on Contact Details Screen now matches the map screen.
1300.c9: Month and annual total calculations now properly limit your credit time to 55 hours per month. Standard time is not affected by this rule. If you exceed this time using credit, you'll have overage displayed on your month's details screen.
1300.c10: Added time credit support. Existing users will be able to update their old time entries automatically.
1300.c11: Resolved issue with add button overlapping compass on iOS.

1310.c1: Greatly improved performance when navigating to time related screens.
1310.c3: Resolve date localization issue that occurred in some regions.
1310.c4: Updated styles and locations of commonly used items. Month and Service Year reports can be easily accessed in the tab bar at the bottom of the screen.
1310.c5: Resolved style overflow issues that occurred on certain screen sizes for the map screen.
1310.c6: Now automatically prefills recently used addresses when creating multiple contacts on the same day.
1310.c7: You can now toggle visibility of the home screen sections. Visit Preferences > Home Screen.
1310.c8: The app now is named WitnessWork, formerly 'JW Time' due to legal reasons.
1310.c9: Languages now attempt to find your exact region, otherwise it falls back to any locale with your language. If nothing can be found, it defaults to English.
1310.c10: Bemba language added! We need your help to translate. Please visit Settings > Help Translate

1320.c1: Now create coordinate only contacts. If your territory is very rural or with bad mapping information, there is now no need to rely on an address.
1320.c2: Easily toggle between device, dark, and light mode color scheme. Visit Preferences > Appearance.
1320.c3: Added Kinyarwanda language. Do you speak Kinyarwanda? We need your help to translate (bemba too)! Please visit Settings > Help Translate
1320.c4: 'Add Time' screen now allows for increments of 1 minute.

categoryNeeded: You must select an existing category or add a custom category.
theHoursBelowAreAlreadyIncludedInMyTotal: The categories below are already included in my total hours.
otherHoursDescription: Below is already included in total
failedToOpenLink_description: Please verify you have a valid application for the provided link. This error typically means you do not have a browser installed on your device.
noTimeReports_description: Add at least one time entry for this month to view details.
cannotNavigateToFutureMonth_description: Select the current or previous month.
addATimeEntryToViewReport: Add a time entry to view your monthly report.
hoursPerMonthToGoal: hours per month to annual goal
donate_warning: You do not receiving any goods or services in exchange for donating.
donate_description: Please do not donate if you are currently not in a financially stable position. Instead, share the app with your brothers and sisters so they can also enjoy it!
donate_faqAnswer1: As a brother in the hall, I consider it a privilege to be able to use my skills to help others in the congregation. Although free to everyone, developing, running, and maintaining this application, unfortunately costs a significant amount of money and time. I view donating as similar to how one might pay for another's gas after going in service with them - it's a loving gesture that goes greatly appreciated.
donate_faq2: What are the donations used for?
donate_faqAnswer2: Your donation helps keeps this app running! There are costs with purchasing real devices as development equipment, paying for location API service fees, build service API fees, app store fees, and opportunity cost of my many hours spent developing this app. Each piece of support is greatly appreciated!
couldNotFindOffer: Could Not Find offer. Please try again later.
thereAreNoOfferings: There are no donation methods available at this time. Please check again later.
donate_letter:
Dear Brother or Sister,

I am very honored that you have chosen my app to use in the sea of other amazing choices. I started working on this app when I was pioneering - I just couldn't find a clear and concise place to keep my notes. For me, it felt like I would always lose my paper notes and somehow forget my return visits. I knew a lot of other people felt the same way. My goal when creating this app was to focus on high utility but also simplicity. Anyone should be able to use this app, no matter their age or publisher experience. I hope my app has been a useful tool for you and your service to Jehovah. I have spent countless hours developing this app, and I am very happy to see it being used by so many brothers and sisters around the world. If you haven't already, please let others know about WitnessWork - it's a labor of love. Regardless if you choose to donate, I hope you continue to enjoy the app and the future updates.

Thank you,

Levi Wilkerson
donate_letter_ps: P.S. I'm always available to talk about anything - personal questions, app questions, or other concerns. Feel free to reach out to me at my personal email below.
thankYou_description: I am undeserving of such kindness. Your generosity is greatly appreciated.
failedToOpenMailApplication_description: Please verify you have a valid mail application installed.
errorCheckingOut: There was an error when checking out. It likely is due to network instability, please try again.
goToAppStoreToUpdateSubscriptions: To cancel or edit your subscription, please visit the App Store.
importAndExport_description: Import and export your data to and from WitnessWork. This is useful if you are switching devices or want to backup your data.
importError_description: There was an error importing your file. Please verify that your file is valid and try again.
importErrorInvalidFile_description: The file you are trying to import is invalid. Please use the exported file from WitnessWork and try again.
backupRecommendations:
It is recommended to store your backup in cloud storage. This will ensure you do not lose your data in the event you lose or break your device.

This feature also works when transferring to and from Android or iOS or other devices.
backupReasoning: Because your data will never be stored on servers, the app will never have a 'sync' functionality. Instead, you must manually import and export your data. This is a security feature to ensure your data is never compromised.
sharingIsNotAvailable: Sharing is not available on this platform.
errorExporting_description: There was an error exporting your data. Please ensure your device has enough storage and that sharing is available, then try again.
map_noContactsWithGeocodes: You do not have any contacts with coordinates yet. Try to add a contact or update your existing contacts to include a coordinate.
howToDeleteTime: Delete a time entry by swiping on it from the right, try it!
howToArchiveContact: Archive old contacts by swiping on it from the right. Archived contacts can be restored later from the settings.
howToEditAndDeleteConversation:
Edit a conversation by tapping on it or swipe on it from the left.

To delete, swipe on it from the right.
detailedProgressBar_description: Updates the home screen progress bar and breaks down your time entries by category. It also shows your time as decimal so it is more accurate.
viewTimeReportsForThisDate: View all reports for this day. Swipe on a report to delete it.
noReportsThisDay: No time reports for this day yet.
daysSinceLastBackup_description: WitnessWork will notify you after this many days since your last backup to create a new backup of your data.
recommendedBackup_description: It has been over {{count}} days since your last backup. It is recommended to create a new backup now.
thisGloballyOffsetsTextSize: It is recommended to change your device's text size if you are having trouble reading the app. This setting will affect the entire apps's font size.
planSchedule_description: Scheduling your service days will help you visualize your service month. This is especially useful for those with a monthly goal.
oneTimeSchedule_description: One time plans will override any recurring schedules.
timePlanned_description: The percentage of your time planned for the month relative to your publisher type's goal. Try to plan for at least 100% of your goal.
complete_description: If you meet your planned time for a day, it is marked as complete.
deletePlan_description: Deleting this plan will permanently remove it.
existingPlansForDay_description: You already have these plans for this day. Swipe to delete them.
viewAllReportAndPlansForDate: View all reports and plans for this day. Swipe to delete an item. Day plans always override any recurring plans.
youCannotCreateAPlanForAPreviousDay: You cannot create a plan for a previous date.
nwPublisherOnlyAllowsLastMonth: NW Publisher only allows you to submit the previous month's report.
deleteField_description: Are you sure you want to delete this custom field?
resetTimer_description: You will lose your current time entry if you reset the timer. Do you want to reset?
notEnoughTime_description: Not enough time has elapsed. You must have at least 5 minutes to submit a time entry.
providedTimeIsLessThanFiveMinutes: Provided time is less than 5 minutes.
tryToPlanAtLeast100Percent: Try to plan at least 100% of your goal.
updateTime_description: Edit or delete a previous service report
thisContactHasNoConversations: This contact has no conversations yet.
youHaveCreditOverage: You have credit overage in the amount of {{count}} hours
credit_description: Credit will be counted towards the month if your standard time plus credit doesn't exceed 55 hours.
creditOverageInTheAmountOf: Credit overage in the amount of {{count}} hours.
witnessWorkNowSupportsCredits: WitnessWork now properly supports credits for those with an annual service goal. Once your update an existing tag, all of your service reports will update as well.
noReportsForThisYear: There are no service entries for {{count}}.
lookingForViewHours_description: If you're a standard publisher, but you want to record your hours for personal reasons - change your publisher status to 'Custom'. Then, the month tab will become available to you from the home screen.
dontWantGoal_description: Set your hour requirement to 0. This will allow you to record your time, like pioneers, without a goal.
timePlanned_description2: Your goal is determined by your publisher type. Try to plan for at least 100% of your goal.
sectionsVisibility_description: Toggle visibility on sections of the home screen to reduce clutter.
approachingConversations_description: Iki gice kigaragara iyo gusa ufite gusubira gusura byapanzwe mu uri uwo munsi.
locationDisabled_description: Your location sharing is disabled. The map will not be able to automatically zoom into your location.
overrideCoordinate_description: You specified your own coordinate. Since you just changed the address, do you want to automatically fetch an updated coordinate based on the new address?
pinLocation_description: A pin will automatically be created based on an address you enter. If you wish, you can add a custom pin location below.
providedTimeIsLessThanOneMinute: Provided time is less than one minute.
